data.name: Microtransaction Simulator Game of the Decade: Deluxe Edition
data.detailed_description:
A game of loss and triumph. Spending money virtually has never been easier. Microtransaction Simulator Game of the Decade: Deluxe Edition takes everything the original game had, makes it 3D, adds more items, adds some recipes, and more. Kick your microtransaction habit by playing a harmless useless clone of AAA games pay-2-win systems.

The only spritual successor game not funded through kick-starter


Microtransaction Simulator Game of the Decade: Deluxe Edition is an all-new open-world platformer shooter fps battle royale mmo rpg vr from genre veterans chlsea.

Features:
- no microtransactions
- riveting plot of microtransactions
- side-missions
- no replayability
